item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6.5 Adds Elsa Bloodstone and Team-Up Changes
item.content:encoded:
Marvel Rivals is ready to launch Season 6.5. A new hero joins the action, Team-Up abilities change, and more.

Launching on February 13, Elsa Bloodstone will join the action as a Duelist. The news was announced in a social media video presented by GuangGuang from the development team.

Changes to the Team-Up Abilities in Marvel Rivals

The Team-Up Ability changes see the exit of the Fantastic Four Team-Up Ability. In its place, the Invisible Woman will partner with Doctor Strange for the new Psionic Mayhem team-up. Elsa Bloodstone is added to Mr. Poolâ€™s Interdimensional Toy Box Team-Up.

Bloodstone will team with Deadpool for a new attack that forces enemies to hear Deadpoolâ€™s non-stop talking.

The Thing has been added to Hulkâ€™s Gamma Charge Team-Up, and Mr. Fantastic joins the Rocket Network team-up with Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord.

Insider Gaming will update this post with additional details once the full patch notes are released.

Are you excited for the changes coming to the next patch of Marvel Rivals? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, donâ€™t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
